thread.title: Romantic weekend
thread.title_full: Romantic weekend - Review of Hotel Queen Mary, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: A6161YHadam
title: Romantic weekend
text: The hotel is located in a quiet area but give it 5 minutes walk and you'll find yourself at the metro station Havre or Auber which will take you wherever you will go och you stay at this area and spend some time at the terrific shoppingarea. Romance was the subject of our journey and Hotel queen mary was a good choice for us.
